trans-unit.source: Dynamically performs hit testing on a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Dynamiskt utför träffar tester på en <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The IncrementalHitTester dynamically determines whether the user "hits" a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: IncrementalHitTester avgör dynamiskt om användaren "träffar" <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: This class enables you to provide immediate feedback to the user in situations such as selecting and erasing ink.
trans-unit.target: Den här klassen kan du ange omedelbar feedback till användaren i situationer, till exempel välja och radera handskrift.

trans-unit.source: There are two classes that inherit from IncrementalHitTester: - The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester> hit tests strokes by determining whether a lasso path surrounds it.
trans-unit.target: Det finns två klasser som ärver från IncrementalHitTester:- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester>nådde tester linjer genom att fastställa om en lasso sökväg omger det.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> hit tests strokes by determining where an eraser path intersects it.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester>Träffar tester linjer genom att fastställa där en Radera sökväg korsar det.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists where to learn how to manage digital ink on a custom control.
trans-unit.target: I följande tabell visas var du vill lära dig hur du hanterar digitala pennanteckningar på en anpassad kontroll.

trans-unit.source: |To do this…|See this article| |-----------------|----------------------| |Create a control that collects digital ink|[Creating an Ink Input Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| |Create a control that enables the user to select ink|[How to: Select Ink from a Custom Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| |Create a control that enables the user to point-erase ink|[How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| ## XAML Text Usage This class is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: | Om du vill... | Finns i denna artikel | |-----------------|----------------------| | Skapa en kontroll som samlar in digitala pennanteckningar | [Skapar en färg indata kontrollen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| | Skapa en kontroll som gör att användaren kan markera pennanteckningar | [Så här: Välj pennanteckningar från en anpassad kontroll](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| | Skapa en kontroll som gör att användaren kan punkt Radera pennanteckningar | [Så här: Radera pennanteckningar på en anpassad kontroll](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) | ## XAML Text användning av den här klassen används inte vanligtvis i XAML.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds points to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lägger till pekar på den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En matris av typen <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> att lägga till den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lägger till den angivna <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objekt till den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En samling <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objekt som ska läggas till i <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds points to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lägger till pekar på den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The points to add
trans-unit.target: Pekar på Lägg till

trans-unit.source: Releases resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigör resurser som används av den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call the EndHitTesting method when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester> finishes hit testing.
trans-unit.target: Anropa metoden EndHitTesting när den <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester>slutförs träffar testning.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester>

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref> is hit testing.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar om den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"> </xref> påverkas testning.

trans-unit.source: The IsValid returns `true` until <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester.EndHitTesting%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar IsValid `true` tills <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester.EndHitTesting%2A>kallas.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester.EndHitTesting%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then it returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Den returnerar `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref> is hit testing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"> </xref> påverkas tester, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
